question.prompt:
He asked, "So what shall I do?" 

Choose the correct indirect speech sentence.

options.label: He asked what should he do.
He asked what he should do.
He asked what he shall do.
He asked if what he should do.

hint: Trong câu hỏi gián tiếp, đổi trật tự từ (chủ ngữ đứng trước động từ) và lùi thì của động từ khuyết thiếu (shall -> should).

question.prompt:
She asked me, "Where will you go tomorrow?" 

Choose the correct indirect speech sentence.

options.label: She asked me where would I go the next day.
She asked me where I will go tomorrow.
She asked me where I would go the next day.
She asked me where I would go tomorrow.

hint: Khi chuyển sang câu gián tiếp, cần lùi thì (will -> would), đổi đại từ (you -> I), và đổi trạng từ chỉ thời gian (tomorrow -> the next day).

question.prompt:
My friend asked, "Can you help me with this exercise?" 

Choose the correct indirect speech sentence.

options.label: My friend asked if I could help him with that exercise.
My friend asked can I help him with this exercise.
My friend asked if I can help him with that exercise.
My friend asked whether could I help him with that exercise.

hint: Đối với câu hỏi Yes/No, dùng 'if' hoặc 'whether'. Lùi thì (can -> could), đổi đại từ (you -> I, me -> him) và từ chỉ định (this -> that).

question.prompt:
The teacher said to us, "Are you listening to me?" 

Choose the correct indirect speech sentence.

options.label: The teacher asked us if were we listening to her.
The teacher asked us whether we are listening to her.
The teacher asked us if we were listening to me.
The teacher asked us if we were listening to her.

hint: Đây là câu hỏi Yes/No nên dùng 'if/whether'. Lùi thì từ hiện tại tiếp diễn sang quá khứ tiếp diễn và đổi đại từ cho phù hợp (you -> we, me -> her).

question.prompt:
He asked his son, "Why did you come late?" 

Choose the correct indirect speech sentence.

options.label: He asked his son why did he come late.
He asked his son why he had come late.
He asked his son why he came late.
He asked his son that why he had come late.

hint: Khi động từ tường thuật ở quá khứ, thì quá khứ đơn (did come) trong câu trực tiếp được lùi về thì quá khứ hoàn thành (had come).

question.prompt:
The policeman asked the boy, "What is your name?" 

Choose the correct indirect speech sentence.

options.label: The policeman asked the boy what his name was.
The policeman asked the boy what was his name.
The policeman asked the boy what his name is.
The policeman asked the boy if what his name was.

hint: Trong câu hỏi gián tiếp, động từ 'to be' (is) phải được lùi thì (was) và đặt sau chủ ngữ (his name).

question.prompt:
Mom asked me, "Have you finished your homework yet?" 

Choose the correct indirect speech sentence.

options.label: Mom asked me if had I finished my homework yet.
Mom asked me whether I have finished my homework yet.
Mom asked me if I had finished my homework yet.
Mom asked me if I finished my homework yet.

hint: Lùi thì từ hiện tại hoàn thành (have finished) sang quá khứ hoàn thành (had finished) và dùng 'if/whether' cho câu hỏi Yes/No.

question.prompt:
She asked him, "Who called you last night?" 

Choose the correct indirect speech sentence.

options.label: She asked him who called him last night.
She asked him who had called him last night.
She asked him who did call him the previous night.
She asked him who had called him the previous night.

hint: Lùi thì từ quá khứ đơn (called) sang quá khứ hoàn thành (had called) và đổi trạng từ thời gian (last night -> the previous night).

question.prompt:
He asked, "Shall we go to the cinema?" 

Choose the correct indirect speech sentence.

options.label: He asked if should they go to the cinema.
He asked if they should go to the cinema.
He asked whether they shall go to the cinema.
He suggested that they should go to the cinema.

hint: Câu hỏi đề nghị với 'Shall we...?' khi tường thuật lại dưới dạng câu hỏi sẽ được chuyển thành 'if/whether they should...'.

question.prompt:
The examiner asked her, "How often do you practice English?" 

Choose the correct indirect speech sentence.

options.label: The examiner asked her how often she practiced English.
The examiner asked her how often did she practice English.
The examiner asked her how often she practices English.
The examiner asked her that how often she practiced English.

hint: Lùi thì từ hiện tại đơn (do you practice) sang quá khứ đơn (practiced) và giữ trật tự từ của câu khẳng định (chủ ngữ + động từ).
